communityrequests-wish-loading-error: Error message shown when loading the form.
communityrequests-form-subtitle: Introductory text at the top of the form.
communityrequests-title-error:
Error message shown when the title is not of the correct length.

Parmaeters:
* $1 — minimum number of characters
* $2 — maximum number of characters
communityrequests-description-error:
Error message shown when the description isn't long enough.

Parameters:
*$1 — minimum number of characters
communityrequests-wishtype-error: Error message shown when no radio button is selected.
communityrequests-project-show-less: Label for button with which to collapse the project list.
communityrequests-project-show-all: Label for button with which to show the full project list.
communityrequests-project-other-error:
Error message shown when the value in the other-project field isn't long enough.

Parameters:
*$1 — minimum number of characters
communityrequests-project-no-selection:
Error message shown when no project has been selected.

Parameters
*$1 —  minimum number of projects that need to be selected
*$2 — the 'other projects' label, as defined in {{msg-mw|communityrequests-project-other-label}}
communityrequests-audience-error:
Error message shown when the audience field is not of the correct length.

Parmaeters:
* $1 — minimum number of characters
* $2 — maximum number of characters
communityrequests-phabricator-chip-desc: Aria description added to each Phabricator task ID chip.
communityrequests-create-success: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after a new wish has been created.
communityrequests-edit-success: Success message shown in the post-edit banner after an existing wish has been saved.
communityrequests-view-all-wishes: Link text for the link back to the 'all wishes' page.
communityrequests-close: Image alt text for the close icon shown on the post-edit banner.
communityrequests-publish: Form submission button label for new wishes.
communityrequests-save: Form submission button label for existing wishes.
